song_name: Castlevania PoR - The Gears Go Awry
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Castlevania PoR - The Gears Go Awry is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Castlevania PoR - The Gears Go Awry has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Minor, G♯ Minor,  and D♯ Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
